panels.description: Displays the data usage (down/up), as well as the change over the dashboard time range.
panels.title: Data Usage

panels.description: Displays the maximum instantaneous bitrate over the dashboard's time range
panels.title: Max bitrate

targets.expr: sum(sagemcom_fast_system_device_info) by (backup_software_version, gui_firmware_version, internal_firmware_version, mac_address, model_name, ont_serial_number, router_name, software_version, hardware_version)
sum(sagemcom_fast_wifi_radio_info) by (alias, name, regulatory_domain, supported_bandwidth, supported_standards)
sum(sagemcom_fast_wifi_ssid_info) by (alias, name, radio, mac_address, ssid, status)

panels.description: CPU time used per process aggregated by name, so some of these reflect multiple PIDs
panels.title: Process CPU

panels.description: Memory usage of each process - aggregated by name, so some of these reflect multiple PIDs
panels.title: Process Size

targets.expr: sum(sagemcom_fast_system_device_info) by (backup_software_version, gui_firmware_version, internal_firmware_version, mac_address, model_name, ont_serial_number, router_name, software_version, hardware_version)
